Mahmood to Symonds, 1 run fullish delivery outside off, Symonds gets forward and pushes it to mid-off

Mahmood to Gilchrist, no run dropped! Checked drive back at Mahmood who bends down and misses what would have been a very good return catch inches off the ground to his right
Mahmood to Gilchrist, (no ball) 1 run Mahmood, angry at the drop, oversteps, Gilchrist works it to deep midwicket
Mahmood to Symonds, no run Symonds back and into line

Panesar to Gilchrist, no run on the money and that's defended

Panesar to Gilchrist, no run more defence
Panesar to Gilchrist, 1 run driven out to mid-off

Mahmood to Symonds, no run left alone, big arms shouldered hugely

Mahmood to Gilchrist, 2 runs ooh, more excitement - Warne just making his ground for the two as it's winged out in front of point. Mahmood was standing by the side of the stumps, instead of behind them, and could have had him way out there. Warne riding his luck, here
